translation: By the Treasury Tribunal, as has been determined today by this Department, orders will be issued for the Collector of Bagé to accept all withdrawals for Your Excellency's Fazenda da Música, and all amounts not yet auctioned and included in the provisions of the Decrees of November 11, 1836, and April 1837: which I communicate to you for your understanding and in response to your letter of the 3rd of this month.
